thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: I had a wonderful experience on Sea Spirit in December. All of the staff were always cheerful and helpful. We were blessed with good weather so the day trips were a joy in a beautiful, pristine environment. The food was excellent with a good variety and tea, coffee and hot chocolate available in the bar area whenever you needed it. I was seasick crossing the Drake Passage both ways but the entire experience was well worth it.
